Content.Title: About Us
Content.BodyCopy:
University Communications controls internal and external messaging for Brigham Young University-Idaho. We share our messages through web, print, video, photography and radio. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Below is a list of the different areas of our office:

Web Services

We develop and manage CSS, HTML and Javascript for the BYU-Idaho website. For website building support, please contact the Web Project Coordinator at 496-2034 or ucweb@byui.edu.

Graphic Design

We design creative, executive level advertising and publication for BYU-Idaho. For graphic design questions, please contact the Print Project Coordinator at 496-2041 or ucprojects@byui.edu.

Video Production

We film and produce executive level and institutional video messages for BYU-Idaho. For video production questions, please contact the Video Project Coordinator at 496-2043 or ucvideo@byui.edu.

Photography

We photograph campus events as well as offer BYU-Idaho department photo shoots. For photo assistance, please contact the Photography Project Coordinator at 496-2050 or ucphoto@byui.edu.

Marketing & Strategy

We strategize executive level marketing campaigns as well as manage the brand and identity of BYU-Idaho. For campus publicity or marketing assistance, please contact our Marketing Managers at 496-2028 or ucidentity@byui.edu.                                                                                                

News & Broadcasting

We report campus news and events for employee News & Notes and the online BYU-Idaho Newsroom. Contact our writing staff regarding campus stories at 496-2029 or newsdesk@byui.edu. 

KBYI/KBYR

We report for and manage the KBYI and KBYR radio stations. For radio questions please contact us at 496-2001 or KBYI@byui.edu/KBYR@byui.edu.
